name: The First Tree

files.the_first_tree: N/A: Plese select the GOG.com Linux installer (the_first_tree_gog_1_25523.sh)

content:
files:
- the_first_tree: 'N/A: Plese select the GOG.com Linux installer (the_first_tree_gog_1_25523.sh)'
game:
  exe: start.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: the_first_tree
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
